name: markup-kombat
readme:
# Markup-Kombat package

Use exclamations from the hit videogame/film franchise *MORTAL KOMBAT* to write an HTML page. Each exclamation translates to HTML code with tie-ins to [Bootstrap CSS](http://getbootstrap.com), [Google Fonts](http://google.com/fonts) and color schemes generated using [Lavish](http://lavishbootstrap.com), allowing you to quickly write a decent-looking, responsive website.

##Installation

Use the Atom package manager, which can be found in the Settings view!

##Use

Begin by opening up a new file in Atom and typing **MORTAL KOMBAT!**

Now, the arena is yours! Use all-caps, Mortal Kombat inspired exclamations to write your website. Once ready to convert to HTML, press `cmd-alt-K` to translate your incoherent shouting into beautiful kode.

*Most of the kode waits for a line break before adding the closing tag. So be sure to use indenting and lines like you would in HTML. For example:

ROUNDHOUSE KICK! BRUTAL! QUIET! example

Would give you a center-aligned, muted H1 tag that reads "example"*

##THE KODE

begin html, head `MORTAL KOMBAT!`

title `ROUND ONE: title here`

style & font `KOMBATANT VERSUS KOMBATANT`

In Markup-Kombat, your website is the arena. The colors and fonts of your site are dictated by the kombatants in the arena. As of version 0.1.0, you have your choice between any of the original Mortal Kombat playable characters. The kombatant before "VERSUS" dictates the colors, the one after dictates the fonts. **Kombatants to choose from:**

1. GORO
2. JOHNNY CAGE
3. KANO
4. LIU KANG
5. RAIDEN
6. REPTILE
7. SCORPION
8. SHANG TSUNG
9. SONYA BLADE
10. SUB-ZERO

end head, begin body `FIGHT!`

jumbotron `FIRST STRIKE!`

container `YOUR SOUL IS MINE!`

row `COMBO!`

column `X-HIT COMBO!` Since we're using Bootstrap as our main CSS, substitute X for any number between 1 and 12, making sure that any row doesn't exceed 12 "HITS" total.

end divs (like jumbotron, columns and rows) `COMBO BREAKER!`

end container `IS THAT YOUR BEST?`

p `FEAR ME!` or `BRING IT!` or `LET'S DANCE!` followed by a space and your paragraph. End the paragraph with a carriage return.

p class="lead" `THIS WILL BE EASY!` `FOR THE SHAOLIN!` `VENGEANCE WILL BE MINE!`

h1 `BRUTAL!`

h2 `GREAT!`

h3 `GOOD!`

buttons `FROSTY! http://example.com button text` or `TOASTY! http://example.com button text` or `GET OVER HERE! http://example.com button text`

images `PICTURE THIS! http://example.com/example.jpg alt text` or `SHOW ME YOUR MOVES! http://example.com/example.jpg alt text`

text-muted `QUIET!`

center `ROUNDHOUSE KICK!`

hr `THOSE WERE $500 SUNGLASSES, ASSHOLE!`

Bootstrap Javascript `FINISH HIM!`

end body `FATALITY!`

end html `FLAWLESS VICTORY!`


###Check out the "examples" folder for some example kode!

##TO-DO

  - Navigation menus (again, need a good line to tie them to)
  - Embedding videos
